meanings.definition: A type of lipid found in the brain.
meanings.sent1: The cerebrosides play a crucial role in brain function.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the effects of cerebrosides on brain health.
meanings.sent3: The cerebrosides in the brain decided to have a party to celebrate their importance.
meanings.sent4: Her intelligence was like a collection of vibrant cerebrosides, each one contributing to her brilliance.
meanings.sent5: The cerebrosides, like tiny brain guardians, protect and nourish our mind.
